entry.title: WINSTON POLICE MAKE ARRESTS IN ROBBERY CASE
entry.summary: September 11, 2023 2:30 p.m. Winston Police have made two arrests in a recent robbery case. Information from WPD said on August 24th, officers responded to a report of a robbery at the Fox Den on Northwest Douglas Boulevard in Winston. Officers began investigating and developed leads on two suspects. On Thursday, officers learned their...

entry.title: Firefighters respond to Cole Road Fire
entry.summary: OAKLAND — Several firefighting agencies responded to a reported structure and vegetation fire near the 4900 block of Cole Road in Oakland.

entry.title: Most evacuation notices canceled for Tyee Ridge Complex
entry.summary: DOUGLAS COUNTY — Douglas County Sheriff's Office downgraded most evacuation notices at the Tyee Ridge Complex fires after consulting with the board of commissioners, emergency management and fire managers.

entry.title: Two people arrested in connection to robbery at Fox Den
entry.summary: WINSTON — Two people have been arrested in connection to an Aug. 24 robbery at the Fox Den in Winston.

entry.title: SEVERAL TYEE RIDGE COMPLEX EVACUATION NOTICED CANCELED
entry.summary: September 11, 2023 2:00 p.m. The Douglas County Sheriff’s Office downgraded most evacuation notices previously issued due to the Tyee Ridge Complex fires, as of 1:00 p.m. Monday. The decision was made in coordination with fire managers, Douglas County Board of Commissioners, and Douglas County Emergency Management, based on the reduction of risk to residents:...

entry.summary: Glide School District Superintendent Robert Freeman talks about the district which he is now leading: Click here to download for later listening: IDC 9 11 23

entry.title: Trial for man who allegedly killed 3 in drunk driving crash to be moved
entry.summary: Uriah James Carleton will not face a jury of his peers on Oct. 10, due to a scheduling conflict with a key witness for the defense.

entry.title: FOCUS SHIFTS FROM SUPPRESSION TO MOP UP
entry.summary: September 11, 2023 11:15 a.m. The focus has shifted from suppression to mop up on the Tyree Ridge Complex, 20 miles northwest of Roseburg. The complex is listed at 7,922 acres and is 48 percent contained. 1,214 people are assigned to the fires. An update from Northwest Incident Management Team 3 said weather and fire...

entry.title: POLICE RESPOND TO SIX ALCOHOL RELATED INCIDENTS
entry.summary: September 11, 2023 11:00 a.m. Roseburg Police responded to six alcohol related incidents between Friday and Sunday. The police log said three people were jailed after alleged DUII incidents while two people were cited for similar DUII incidents. One man was cited for drinking in public after an officer reportedly watched him drink a beer...

entry.title: ROSEBURG POLICE CITE MAN FOR PRIOR HIT AND RUN ACCIDENT
entry.summary: September 11, 2023 10:50 a.m. Roseburg Police cited a man Saturday night for a prior hit and run incident. An RPD report said the 24-year man was identified as the suspect, He agreed to turn himself in to the Roseburg Police Department on Southeast Douglas Avenue, and did so Saturday afternoon at approximately 3:30 p.m....

entry.title: MAN CITED BY ROSEBURG POLICE FOR ALLEGED HARASSMENT
entry.summary: September 9, 2023 10:30 a.m. A Roseburg man was cited by Roseburg Police for an alleged harassment incident early Saturday evening. An RPD report said just after 5:30 p.m. an officer responded to Eagle’s Park in the 900 block of Southeast Lane Street, regarding a disturbance between a man and a woman. The officer determined...

entry.title: Stand Down for Douglas County Homeless Veterans
entry.summary: ROSEBURG — A Stand Down for Douglas County Homeless Veterans is scheduled from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. Wednesday at VFW Post 2468 at 1127 NE Walnut Street in Roseburg.

entry.title: ONE PERSON TAKEN TO HOSPITAL AFTER SINGLE-VEHICLE WRECK
entry.summary: September 11, 2023 10:20 a.m. One person was taken to the hospital after a single-vehicle accident on Saturday night. A Roseburg Police report said at 8:00 p.m. a driver was southbound on Northeast Stephens Street when he attempted to turn onto Northeast Winchester Avenue. He missed the turn and the vehicle hit the curb just...
